name: myPM SCG Pro Data File
summary: Learn about .SCGP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: An SCG definition is the configuration data used by the program to process the .XLS or .XLSX data source file, populate the template file and generate the output file. The configuration information includes project details, S curve files, S curve options, data source map, and data source filter. You can view the SCG Definition configuration data through the various tabs located on the main form.

Different versions of the myPM SCG application, such as Starter, Classic, and Pro, are available for purchase, each providing different features. Starter version uses the .SCGS extension and Classic uses the .SCGC extension for data files.
NOTE: myPM SCG Pro requires an installation of Microsoft Excel. The program has also been discontinued.

description: Data file created by myPM SCG Pro, an application that integrates with Excel to generate histograms, S curves, and project statistics of the Excel data; contains one or more SCG definitions that can be modified.
